::DrillBit::

He followed everyone to the meeting room. He didn't know if KitKat
wanted him there, but for now he was staying. He sat, waiting for it all
to start.

::Hot Rod::

He wounds continued to heal in the CR.

::Demolition::

He shot a few shots at the enemy base.
